# setConfidence(_:)

**Instance Method**

Indicate the level of confidence in being able to handle the network.

## Declaration

```swift
func setConfidence(_ confidence: NEHotspotHelperConfidence)
```

## Parameters

- **confidence**: The level of confidence that the caller has in being able to help the system connect to this network.

## Discussion

Hotspot Helper apps use this method in the response to the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotHelperCommandType/evaluate] and [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotHelperCommandType/filterScanList] commands.

## Network annotation

- **NEHotspotHelperConfidence**: A type that indicates the hotspot helper’s confidence in its ability to handle the network.
- **setPassword(_:)**: Provide the password for a protected network.
